title: (x) AiLive logo - Avenir (customised) {Skylar Fein, Raph}
content:
[http://www.ailive.net/images/ailogo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20061120053327/http:/www.ailive.net/images/ailogo.jpg)

The curved capital L seems unusual.

Thanks.

John.
author: funge

comments.content: This looks like a slightly customized [Avenir Roman](http://web.archive.org/web/20061120053327/https:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=LH.107898.0.5&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=AiLive&sampleSize=60).
It looks like [Avenir 65 Medium](http://web.archive.org/web/20061120053327/http:/www.linotype.com/12837/avenir65medium-font.html), with a customized L.

I also got an e-mail request to ID this, and I suggested that the L was taken from ITC Bauhaus. Font mixing is a favorite way to ‘customize’ for some folks, without designing anything.

- Mike Yanega
